mcq.statement: Choose the correct statement: A single chlorine free radical can destroy 10000 ozone molecules f, Ultraviolet radiation from sun cause a reaction that produces ozone, Ozone hole is depletion in total amount of O, All of above

options.b: Ultraviolet radiation from sun cause a reaction that produces ozone
